channel.title: Get Your First 10 Customers
channel.description:
Getting your first customers is the hardest step for any MicroSaaS founder.
Get Your First 10 Customers is the podcast that helps you go from zero to traction by breaking down the top lessons shared every day in the subreddit micro-saas.
Each episode summarizes the most valuable posts and comments from real founders: how they found their first users, what channels actually worked, the mistakes they made, and the creative tactics they tried.
No theory. No fluff. Just raw insights you can apply right now to win your first customers and start building trust in your product.
